card.name: Breakout
card.property: Scenario Contents: Wrecher A, Thunderball A, Piledriver A, and Bulldozer A as villains. (Version B for increased difficulty.) Wrecker, Thunderball, Piledriver, and Bulldozer encounter decks.\nSetup: Put the Day of Reckoning, Thunderstruck, Pile It On!, and Clear the Road side schemes into play. Place the active counter on Wrecker. Advance to stage 1B.

alternate.name: Breakout
alternate.property: [star] Forced Response: After step one of the villain phase, place 1 threat on each side scheme. Move the active counter to the villain whose scheme has the most threat. (If there is a tie, the first player chooses.) If theis stage is completed, the players lose the game

card.name: Wrecker
card.property: While Wrecker is attacking, he gets +2 ATK if the attack is undefended. When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

card.name: Wrecker
card.property: While Wrecker is attacking, he gets +2 ATK if the attack is undefended. When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

card.name: Day of Reckoning
card.property: Wrecker's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Wrecker is in play. Hard Hitter — Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, deal 2 damage to each friendly character. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

card.name: Held Hostage
card.property: Attach to the active villain's side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attacked scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then discard this card.

card.name: Magic Crowbar
card.property: Forced Response: After Wrecker attacks, place 1 threat on the side scheme with the least threat. Attach to Wrecker. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand → discard this card.

card.name: Wrecker's Command
card.property: Forced Response: After Wrecker schemes, place 1 threat on each other villain's side scheme. Attach to Wrecker. Hero Action: Spend [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Corrupt Prison Guard
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

card.name: Escaped Convict
card.property: Surge Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. If you are in hero form, that villain attacks you after this attack. That attack does not get a boost card.

card.name: Buddy System
card.property: When Revealed: Choose the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. Reveal the top card of his deck (top 2 cards instead if he is the only villain in play). Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

card.name: Chaos In the Prison
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either discard an upgrade you control or place 1 threat on the active villain's side scheme for each upgrade you control. If you do not control any upgrades, this card gains surge. If this attack is undefended, discard an upgrade you control.

card.name: Crowbar Toss
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Wrecker schemes. Then, move the active villain counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. When Revealed (Hero): Wrecker attacks you. Then, move the active villain counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

card.name: Get Wrecked!
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

card.name: I've Been Waiting For This!
card.property: When Revealed: The active villain heals 3 hit points. Give that villain a tough status card. Move the active counter to the villain with the least threat on his side scheme. That villain schemes.

card.name: Mystical Link
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each side scheme. Wrecker gets +3 ATK for this activation unless you place 2 threat on his side scheme.

card.name: You're Dead Meat!
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to the hero or ally with the fewest remaining hit points. If that character is defeated this way, place 3 threat on Wrecker's side scheme.

card.name: Thunderball
card.property: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control. When Thunderball schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

card.name: Thunderball
card.property: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks you, deal 1 damage to each character you control. When Thunderball schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

card.name: Thunderstruck
card.property: Thunderball's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Thunderball is in play. Gamma Blast — Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, stun each friendly character. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

card.name: Ball and Chain
card.property: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks, place 1 threat on the main scheme. Attach to Thunderball. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand → discard this card.

card.name: Held Hostage
card.property: Attach to the active villain's side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

card.name: Radioactive Buildup
card.property: Forced Response: After Thunderball attacks, discard this card. Attach to Thunderball. Excess damage dealt by Thunderball is placed as threat on his corresponding side scheme.

card.name: Corrupt Prison Guard
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

card.name: Escaped Convict
card.property: Surge Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. If you are in hero form, that villain attacks you after this attack. That attack does not get a boost card.

card.name: Buddy System
card.property: When Revealed: Choose the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. Reveal the top card of his deck (top 2 cards instead if he is the only villain in play). Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

card.name: Chaos In the Prison
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either discard an upgrade you control or place 1 threat on the active villain's side scheme for each upgrade you control. If you do not control any upgrades, this card gains surge. If this attack is undefended, discard an upgrade you control.

card.name: Energy Projectiles
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each friendly character you control. Deal 1 damage to the defending character.

card.name: Get Wrecked!
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

card.name: I've Been Waiting For This!
card.property: When Revealed: The active villain heals 3 hit points. Give that villain a tough status card. Move the active counter to the villain with the least threat on his side scheme. That villain schemes.

card.name: Lightning Blast
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place 3 threat on the side scheme with the most threat. When Revealed (Hero): Thunderball attacks you. If this attack is undefended, place 3 threat on Thunderball's side scheme.

card.name: Tactical Prowess
card.property: When Revealed: Move all threat from the side scheme with the least threat to the side scheme with the most threat. If that scheme's "Forced Response" ability is not triggered this way, this card gains surge.

card.name: Piledriver
card.property: When Piledriver schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme. Retaliate 1.

card.name: Piledriver
card.property: When Wrecker schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme. Retaliate 1.

card.name: Pile It On!
card.property: Piledriver's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Wrecker is in play. Pile Drive — Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, each player discards the upgrade or support they control with the highest cost. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

card.name: Distracting Taunts
card.property: Attach to Piledriver. Piledriver gets +3 hit points. Players cannot attack other villains. Response: After your hero attacks Piledriver, spend [physical] [physical] resources → discard this card.

card.name: Held Hostage
card.property: Attach to the active villain side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

card.name: Corrupt Prison Guard
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

card.name: Escaped Convict
card.property: Surge Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. If you are in hero form, that villain attacks you after this attack. That attack does not get a boost card.

card.name: Buddy System
card.property: When Revealed: Choose the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. Reveal the top card of his deck (top 2 cards instead if he is the only villain in play). Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

card.name: Get Wrecked!
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

card.name: I've Been Waiting For This!
card.property: When Revealed: The active villain heals 3 hit points. Give that villain a tough status card. Move the active counter to the villain with the least threat on his side scheme. That villain schemes.

card.name: Oversized Hands
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the support you control with the highest cost. If no support was discarded this way, place 2 threat on the active villain's scheme. Discard a support you control.

card.name: Escape Plan
card.property: When Revealed: You are confused. If you are already confused, Piledriver schemes. Give the active villain a tough status card. If they already have a tough status card, place 2 threat on their scheme.

card.name: Pummel
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Piledriver schemes. If Piledriver is tough, he gets +2 SCH for this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Piledriver attacks you. If Piledriver is tough, he gets +2 ATK for this activation.

card.name: Uncanny Resilience
card.property: When Revealed: Remove each stunned and confused status card from each villain. If no status cards were removed, this card gains surge. You are confused.

card.name: Bulldozer
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks, the attack gains overkill. When Piledriver schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

card.name: Bulldozer
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks, the attack gains overkill. When Bulldozer schemes, place the threat on his side scheme instead of the main scheme.

card.name: Clear the Road
card.property: Bulldozer's Side Scheme. This card cannot leave play while Bulldozer is in play. Charge! — Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is 10 or more threat here, each player must discard the top 10 cards of their deck. Remove all but 3 threat from this scheme.

card.name: Bulldozer's Helmet
card.property: Forced Response: After Bulldozer attacks you, discard 1 card from the top of your deck for each point of damage dealt by this attack. Attach to Bulldozer. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero and discard 1 card at random from your hand → discard this card.

card.name: Held Hostage
card.property: Attach to the active villain side scheme. Threat cannot be removed from attached scheme by thwarting. Hero Action: The villain corresponding to the attached side scheme attacks you. Then, discard this card.

card.name: Ramming Speed
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Bulldozer attacks you, you must defend against Bulldozer's attacks with an ally you control, if able. Forced Response: After Bulldozer attacks you, discard this card. Attach to Bulldozer.

card.name: Corrupt Prison Guard
card.property: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.)

card.name: Escaped Convict
card.property: Surge Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. If you are in hero form, that villain attacks you after this attack. That attack does not get a boost card.

card.name: Buddy System
card.property: When Revealed: Choose the villain whose side scheme has the least threat. Reveal the top card of his deck (top 2 cards instead if he is the only villain in play). Move the active counter to the villain whose side scheme has the least threat.

card.name: Bull Rush
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Bulldozer schemes. Discard the top card of your deck for each threat placed by this activation. When Revealed (Hero): Bulldozer attacks you. Discard the top card of your deck for each damage dealt by this attack.

card.name: Chaos In the Prison
card.property: When Revealed: Choose to either discard an upgrade you control or place 1 threat on the active villain's side scheme for each upgrade you control. If you do not control any upgrades, this card gains surge. If this attack is undefended, discard an upgrade you control.

card.name: Get Wrecked!
card.property: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain whose side scheme has the most threat schemes. When Revealed (Hero): The villain whose side scheme has the least threat attacks you.

card.name: Headbutt
card.property: When Revealed: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you are in hero form, take damage equal to that card's printed cost. If you are in alter-ego form, place threat on Bulldozer's side scheme equal to that card's printed cost.

card.name: Leading the Charge
card.property: When Revealed: Discard the top X cards of your deck, where X is Bulldozer's ATK. Place 1 threat on Bulldozer's side scheme for each different card type discarded this way
